jam.fit
Class GaussianFit3

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.fit.Fit
        |
        +--jam.fit.NonLinearFit
              |
              +--jam.fit.GaussianFit3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, PlotMouseListener
public abstract class GaussianFit3
extends NonLinearFit

This abstract class uses NonLinearFit to fit a single gaussian peak with a background.. The background is a polynomial up to a quadradic term if desired. (MaxCH-MinCH)/2 is the term the polynomial is expanded in.

Version:
0.5, 8/31/98
Author:
Dale Visser
See Also:
NonLinearFit
